div.l: Thou Schalte A Cake of halfe A busschelle Fynde
That was ymade of þyne owne Mele
Whiche þat I helpe My Syer to stele
And gode lemman god the Saue ⁊and kepe
And with þat worde Allmoste Sche gan to wepe
Aleyn vpryste ⁊and þoughte or þat itt dawe
I woll go crepen in by my Fellawe
And Fonde þe cradulle with his hande anon
By god þoughte he All wronge haue I gone
My hede is totye of my Swynke to nyghte
That makeþe me þat I go notte Arighte
I wotte well by þe cradulle I haue Mysgo
Here lyethe the Myller And his wyfe allso
And Forþe he goþe on twenty deuylwaye
Into the bedde þ̉er the Myller laye
He wende to haue cropen by his Fellawe Iohn
And by the Myller in he crepe Anon
And caughte hym by þe necke And soffte he spake
He sayde þou Iohn þou swyneshede Awake
For Cristes Sowle and here A noble game
For by þat lorde þat callede is Saynte Iame
As I haue þryse in this Schorte nyghte
Swyuede the Myllers doughter bolte vprighte
Whyle þou haste as A Cowarde bene Agaste
Yea False harlotte qduod the Myller haste
A False tᵃraytoure False Clarke qduod he
Thou schalte be dede by goddes dignyte
Who durste be so bolde to disparage
My doughter þat is comen of Sucche lynage
And by the þrote bolle he caughte Aleyn
And he hente hym dispitouslye Agayne
And on the nose he Smote hym with his Fyste
Downe ranne the blodye Streme vppon his breste
